author: jpata
body:
This PR is to start the discussion on the inclusion of the combined MVA computer based on TMVA, as requested by the BTV conveners.

I would appreciate comments on the implementation already now, however I still need to
- update the weight files with another retraining
- switch to GBRForest in TMVAEvaluator (probably done in common with BTV)
- test on miniAOD.
title: Combined MVA computer based on TMVA (CombinedMVAV2)
